name: Time Gal & Ninja Hayate
overview: Time Gal & Ninja Hayate (タイムギャル＆忍者ハヤテ) is a compilation of two Taito LaserDisc arcade FMV games, Time Gal (1985) and Ninja Hayate (1984), for the Sega Saturn by Ecseco Development. The Time Gal conversion supposedly does not contain anything added by Wolf Team in their earlier Mega CD conversion of the game. This port supposedly adds bonus features to both games.
